text: Luann de Lesseps is going to accept a plea deal following her arrest in Palm Beach, Florida, her attorney, Doug Duncan, announced in court on May 25, according to CBS12. com. She will enter a plea to a lesser misdemeanor charge, her attorney said. The Real Housewives of New York City singer was arrested in Palm Beach on Christmas Eve last year on charges of battery on an officer, disorderly intoxication, resisting arrest with violence, and crimes against a person, the Palm Beach Post reported at the time. Luann reportedly pleaded not guilty following her arrest, according to TMZ. She rejected a plea deal in connection with the case in February.
